casebody.data:
WESOLOWSKI
v.
BROADVIEW HTS. PLANNING COMM. 2018-0711 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 8, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motion of amicus curiae Ohio Home Builders Association to participate in oral argument scheduled for March 27, 2019. Motion granted. Amicus curiae permitted to argue the time allotted for appellee.
